I am [Angelo Morelli](https://github.com/drainr) (angelomorelliam08@gmail.com), a Computer Science student at NCF.

[This project](https://github.com/drainr/citi-bike-live) was an exploration of trends among CitiBike riders in New York City.

This project was created as part of [David Kane's Techne: Getting the Future you Want ISP](isp.davidkane.info).
